summary: The diff implements a comprehensive Resume Builder module with 14 templates, multi-step form wizard, live preview, photo upload, color themes, auto-formatting, and PDF download. However, several requirements are missing: individual template route implementation, PDF generation logic, SEO integration, mobile responsiveness validation, HomePage integration, Header navigation update, and AdPlaceholder integration.

missing_requirements.requirement: Template cards are clickable and lead to individual template builders
missing_requirements.reason: ResumeBuilderPage shows template cards but the click handlers call onNavigate with page strings instead of template slugs. No evidence of routing to individual template builder pages.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement PDF download functionality with proper A4 page sizing, intelligent page breaks, embedded fonts, and template-specific styling using jsPDF or similar
missing_requirements.reason: ResumePreview component has a handleDownloadPDF function that only shows toast notifications with setTimeout. No actual PDF generation library (jsPDF) is imported or used. No A4 sizing, page breaks, or font embedding logic implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: FAQ section with 3-5 questions specific to each template format
missing_requirements.reason: FAQSchema component is added to ResumeTemplateBuilderPage, but the FAQ content is not rendered in the visible page UI. The schema exists for structured data but users cannot see the FAQs on the page.

missing_requirements.requirement: Internal links to Calculator Hub, PDF Tools, and Image Tools are present
missing_requirements.reason: RelatedTools component is defined in ResumeTemplateBuilderPage but is not rendered in the JSX return statement. The component exists but is not displayed to users.

missing_requirements.requirement: Resume Builder hub displays template grid in 1 column on mobile (<768px)
missing_requirements.reason: ResumeBuilderPage uses grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3, which displays 1 column on mobile. However, explicit validation that all Resume Builder components including form wizard and live preview are fully responsive is not evident. ResumeFormWizard has isMobile logic but no validation of touch-friendly controls or 320px width testing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update HomePage to add Resume Builder section alongside existing Calculator Hub, PDF Tools, and Image Tools sections
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to HomePage are shown in the diff. The HomePage modification to add Resume Builder section with category cards is missing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update Header component navigation to include Resume Builder link
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to Header component are shown in the diff. The Header navigation update to add Resume Builder link is missing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Integrate AdPlaceholder components into Resume Builder pages with top banner, in-content, and sidebar ads
missing_requirements.reason: AdPlaceholder component is imported and used in ResumeBuilderPage, but ResumeTemplateBuilderPage (the actual template builder page where users fill forms) does not show AdPlaceholder integration in the diff content. The most important page for ad placement is missing ads.

missing_requirements.requirement: All 14 individual template routes are configured with correct slugs
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx shows routing logic for resume-builder and calls to ResumeTemplateBuilderPage with templateSlug, but the diff is truncated. Cannot verify all 14 individual template routes are configured. The visible portion shows conditional rendering but not all route definitions.

hallucinated_features.description: RelatedTools component defined but not rendered in ResumeTemplateBuilderPage
hallucinated_features.reason: The RelatedTools component is created with Calculator Hub, PDF Tools, and Image Tools links, but it is never included in the JSX return statement, making it dead code.

hallucinated_features.description: validateContrast function in colorThemes.ts that always returns true
hallucinated_features.reason: A validateContrast function is implemented but is a placeholder that always returns true instead of performing actual contrast ratio validation. This was not requested and provides no real functionality.
